title: The Werewolf of Paris
description: Beware the signs of the WEREWOLF:Eyebrows that meet...Long, curved fingernails...Interlocking teeth, with little spaces between...And-the sure sign-Hair on the palm of the hand!!!In this shocking account are presented the details of one such human monster; of men found dead-with their throats ripped to shreds; of graves clawed open-and flesh torn from corpses; of a woman whose bloody wounds were drained by the lips of the man-wolf-This is not a tale for the faint of heart! But for those who reveled in the ghoulish tales of Frankenstein and Dracula, here is the best reading of its kind you've had in years! READ IT! YOU'LL AGREE!!"The Werewolf of Paris is exceedingly strong meat in the way of demonology... Mr Endor works skillfuly on your nerves and complexes." - N.Y. Herald Tribune"An unsurpassed calendar of horrors... sexual and psychological... not for tender stomachs!" - Sat. Revf. of Lit.
author: Guy Endore
